content: Top 14 ‘best’ tech workplaces in India for 2022  Gadgets Now
description: Microsoft’s professional networking platform LinkedIn has announced its top 25 ‘Best Workplaces’ in India list for the year 2022. The listing ranks companies based on seven pillars that it says have shown to lead to career progression: Ability to advance; skills growth; company stability; external opportunity; company affinity; gender diversity and educational background. based on its own data.
